[[Inner Sakura]] appears and Sakura rushes forward with her fists raised, pushing and hitting the target multiple times. Afterwards she finishes with a kick.

==Trivia==
*[[Kakashi Hatake]] and [[Sasuke Uchiha]] can copy this move while in their [[Sharingan]] Mode, showing their inner versions during the attack.
